Miss World 1988, mbipụta nke iri atọ na asatọ  nke asọmupi Miss World, emere na 17 Nọvemba n'afọ 1988 na Royal Albert Hall na London, UK
Onye meriri bụ Linda Pétursdóttir (Queen of Europe) si Iceland
Ọ bụ Miss World 1987, Ulla Weigerstorfer nke Austria kpuchiri ya
Onye nke abụọ bụ Yeon-hee Choi (Queen of Asia) na-anọchite anya Korea na nke atọ bụ Kirsty Roper si United Kingdom

Ọ bụ Peter Marshall chikwara Miss World 1988, onye chikwara asọmupi Miss World ndị ọzọ dịka Miss World 1986, na Alexandra Bastedo, na egwu egwu nke Koreana na 1970s American pop musician Donny Osmond.
